attributes.action: Stop panic buying by introducing a ration coupon system.
attributes.additional_details: I have just returned from a major supermarket in a small town, which was like a visit to East Germany during the soviet communist regime. No milk, bread, tissue,  tinned veg, frozen veg, paracetamol, flour....People are too selfish to listen to advice.As a result, in Britain, 2020, we are having to resort to cutting up newspaper to use in the toilet !
attributes.background: Selfish members of the population are not heeding the shopping advice given by the Government, and the responsible majority are suffering. It's time to get tough and introduce a coupon system to prevent selfish hoarding to the detriment of those who really need these items.
